front.title: Usage Scenarios of a User Registration Protocol (URP)

abstract.t: Many different kinds of commercial networks require users toperform registration before being allowed usage toresources. Resources could include basic access to the network toresources that are more specific such as services in the networkor a certain grade of service, etc. The registration process isnormally specific to the type of network that a user is attachingto and the registration process itself occurs in the protocollayers that are specific to an access technology. With a networklayer (IP) or above solution, a common protocol for performingregistration could be defined.
